channel.title: [Suggestion] Reaper execution, revived with prince - change?
channel.description:
####Basically what people claim happens is that reaper gets executed by the prince and they get revived with their souls.
####I'm pretty sure the reaper _should_ die in this case just like in the lynch case.
####Steps to reproduce: 1. Imprison reaper with at least one collected soul 2. Execute them 3. See them be alive next day.
####Comments: I'm not 100% sure it's a bug. But it feels like it. I hope I'm not in the wrong category. If it's not a bug... I guess this should go to Feedback/Suggestions.
_(Moved to #feedback --Xblade)_

item.title: [Suggestion] Reaper execution, revived with prince - change?
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Keep an eye on who you execute to make sure they stay dead

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Reaper execution, revived with prince - change?
item.dc:creator: Albolynx
item.description:
I am pretty sure this question has come up a couple times already and devs have confirmed it is not a bug.

So yeah - this would go into feedback as it is a balance issue (and as such it should be considered as one, I for one don’t believe Reaper needs a nerf).

Read full topic

item.title: [Suggestion] Reaper execution, revived with prince - change?
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
####Basically what people claim happens is that reaper gets executed by the prince and they get revived with their souls.

####I’m pretty sure the reaper should die in this case just like in the lynch case.

####Steps to reproduce:

  1. Imprison reaper with at least one collected soul
  2. Execute them
  3. See them be alive next day.

####Comments: I’m not 100% sure it’s a bug. But it feels like it. I hope I’m not in the wrong category. If it’s not a bug… I guess this should go to Feedback/Suggestions.

(Moved to #feedback --Xblade)
